typeProperties.script:
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet') ~> paatable
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet') ~> peatable
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet') ~> pebtable
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet') ~> peztable
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet') ~> qtbtable
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet') ~> crctable
source(output(
		SOURCE_CODE_KEY as string,
		SOURCE_SYSTEM as string,
		TARGET_CODE as string,
		TARGET_DESCRIPTION as string,
		CODE_TYPE as string,
		CODE_TYPE_ID as double,
		CODE2 as string,
		OM_X_REF as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet') ~> tcrossreference
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet') ~> pectable
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet') ~> cbsttable
pebtable aggregate(groupBy(pebpeaid = PEBPEAID),
	MAXPEBPEVER = max(PEBPEVER)) ~> maxpeb
Pebselected, maxpeb join(Pebselected@pebpeaid == maxpeb@pebpeaid
	&& Pebpever == MAXPEBPEVER,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'none')~> Join1
qtbtable filter(QTBFIELDN=='pebdunco') ~> pebdunco
Join1, pebdunco join(pebdunco == toInteger(QTBVALUE),
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'none')~> Prtstatusjoin
peatable select(mapColumn(
		peapeaid = PEAPEAID,
		peamdescr = PEAMDESCR,
		peaccode = PEACCODE,
		pealeicode = PEALEICODE,
		peasubtype = PEASUBTYPE,
		peaextid2 = PEAEXTID2
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Peaselected
Prtstatusjoin select(mapColumn(
		pebpebid,
		pebpeaid = Pebselected@pebpeaid,
		pebpeoopeaid,
		pebratcod,
		pebratedate,
		pebisolan,
		pebratcomp,
		pebtaxno,
		Pebpever,
		pebdunco,
		pebpeaid = maxpeb@pebpeaid,
		MAXPEBPEVER,
		QTBFIELDN,
		QTBVALUE,
		QTBMDESCR,
		QTBSDESCR,
		QTBDISPYNSW
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Prtstatus
Prtstatus, Peaselected join(pebpeaid == peapeaid,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'none')~> Join2
crctable select(mapColumn(
		crcratcod = CRCRATCOD,
		crcmdescr = CRCMDESCR
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> crcselected
Join2, crcselected join(pebratcod == crcratcod,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'none')~> Join3
paatable select(mapColumn(
		paapeaid = PAAPEAID,
		paafunct = PAAFUNCT,
		paalongname = PAALONGNAME,
		paacaddress1 = PAACADDRESS1,
		paacaddress4 = PAACADDRESS4,
		paacaddress2 = PAACADDRESS2,
		paacname = PAACNAME,
		paacaddress3 = PAACADDRESS3,
		paactelex = PAACTELEX
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> paaselected
paaselected filter(iifNull(paafunct,0) ==0) ~> Paafiltered
Join3, Paafiltered join(peapeaid == paapeaid,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'none')~> Join4
peztable select(mapColumn(
		pezpezid = PEZPEZID,
		pezdefbusnbranch = PEZDEFBUSNBRANCH
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Pezselected
Join4, Pezselected join(peapeaid == pezpezid,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'none')~> Join5
Expression1, tcrossreference lookup({Source System} == SOURCE_SYSTEM
	&& pebtaxno == SOURCE_CODE_KEY
	&& {Code Type State} == CODE_TYPE_ID,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'none')~> LookupState
pebtable select(mapColumn(
		pebpebid = PEBPEBID,
		pebpeaid = PEBPEAID,
		pebpeoopeaid = PEBPEOOPEAID,
		pebratcod = PEBRATCOD,
		pebratedate = PEBRATEDATE,
		pebisolan = PEBISOLAN,
		pebratcomp = PEBRATCOMP,
		pebtaxno = PEBTAXNO,
		Pebpever = PEBPEVER,
		pebdunco = PEBDUNCO
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Pebselected
Join5 derive(Key = concat('P',toString(peapeaid)),
		{Partner Name} = iifNull(trim(paalongname),iifNull(trim(paacname, peamdescr))),
		Address = concat(trim(paacaddress1),iif(isNull((concat(trim(paacaddress2),concat(trim(paacaddress3), trim(paacaddress4))))),' ',paacaddress2)),
		{Rating Code} = case(isNull(pebratcod),'N/A',pebratcod),
		{Rating Code desc} = case(isNull(crcmdescr),'N/A',crcmdescr),
		{Partner Short Name} = peamdescr,
		Pezdefbusnbranch = toString(pezdefbusnbranch),
		peasubtype = toString(peasubtype),
		{Source System} = 'PARIS',
		{Code Type State} = 368,
		{Code Type Capital} = 116,
		{Code Type Comp Sub} = 795,
		{Code Type Country} = 50) ~> Expression1
LookupState select(mapColumn(
		pebpebid,
		pebpeaid,
		pebpeoopeaid,
		pebratcod,
		pebratedate,
		pebisolan,
		pebratcomp,
		pebtaxno,
		Pebpever,
		pebdunco,
		MAXPEBPEVER,
		QTBFIELDN,
		QTBVALUE,
		QTBMDESCR,
		QTBSDESCR,
		QTBDISPYNSW,
		peapeaid,
		peamdescr,
		peaccode,
		pealeicode,
		peasubtype,
		peaextid2,
		crcratcod,
		crcmdescr,
		paapeaid,
		paafunct,
		paalongname,
		paacaddress1,
		paacaddress4,
		paacaddress2,
		paacname,
		paacaddress3,
		paactelex,
		pezpezid,
		Key,
		{Partner Name},
		Address,
		{Rating Code},
		{Rating Code desc},
		{Partner Short Name},
		Pezdefbusnbranch = Expression1@Pezdefbusnbranch,
		{Source System},
		{Code Type State},
		{Code Type Capital},
		{Code Type Comp Sub},
		{Code Type Country},
		SOURCE_CODE_KEY,
		SOURCE_SYSTEM,
		{State Code} = TARGET_CODE,
		{State Description} = TARGET_DESCRIPTION
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
Select1, tcrossreference lookup({Code Type Capital} == CODE_TYPE_ID
	&& {Source System} == tcrossreference@SOURCE_SYSTEM
	&& Pezdefbusnbranch == tcrossreference@SOURCE_CODE_KEY,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'none')~> LookupCapital
LookupCapital select(mapColumn(
		pebpebid,
		pebpeaid,
		pebpeoopeaid,
		pebratcod,
		pebratedate,
		pebisolan,
		pebratcomp,
		pebtaxno,
		Pebpever,
		pebdunco,
		MAXPEBPEVER,
		QTBFIELDN,
		QTBVALUE,
		QTBMDESCR,
		QTBSDESCR,
		QTBDISPYNSW,
		peapeaid,
		peamdescr,
		peaccode,
		pealeicode,
		peasubtype,
		peaextid2,
		crcratcod,
		crcmdescr,
		paapeaid,
		paafunct,
		paalongname,
		paacaddress1,
		paacaddress4,
		paacaddress2,
		paacname,
		paacaddress3,
		paactelex,
		pezpezid,
		Key,
		{Partner Name},
		Address,
		{Rating Code},
		{Rating Code desc},
		{Partner Short Name},
		Pezdefbusnbranch,
		{Source System},
		{Code Type State},
		{Code Type Capital},
		{Code Type Comp Sub},
		{Code Type Country},
		{State Code},
		{State Description},
		{Capital Code} = TARGET_CODE,
		{Capital Description} = TARGET_DESCRIPTION
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select2
Select2, tcrossreference lookup({Source System} == SOURCE_SYSTEM
	&& {Code Type Comp Sub} == CODE_TYPE_ID
	&& peasubtype == SOURCE_CODE_KEY,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'none')~> LookupCompSubtype
LookupCompSubtype select(mapColumn(
		pebpebid,
		pebpeaid,
		pebpeoopeaid,
		pebratcod,
		pebratedate,
		pebisolan,
		pebratcomp,
		pebtaxno,
		Pebpever,
		pebdunco,
		MAXPEBPEVER,
		QTBFIELDN,
		QTBVALUE,
		QTBMDESCR,
		QTBSDESCR,
		QTBDISPYNSW,
		peapeaid,
		peamdescr,
		peaccode,
		pealeicode,
		peasubtype,
		peaextid2,
		crcratcod,
		crcmdescr,
		paapeaid,
		paafunct,
		paalongname,
		paacaddress1,
		paacaddress4,
		paacaddress2,
		paacname,
		paacaddress3,
		paactelex,
		pezpezid,
		Key,
		{Partner Name},
		Address,
		{Rating Code},
		{Rating Code desc},
		{Partner Short Name},
		Pezdefbusnbranch,
		{Source System},
		{Code Type State},
		{Code Type Capital},
		{Code Type Comp Sub},
		{Code Type Country},
		{State Code},
		{State Description},
		{Capital Code},
		{Capital Description},
		{Company Sub Code} = TARGET_CODE,
		{Company Sub Description} = TARGET_DESCRIPTION
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select3
Select3, tcrossreference lookup({Source System} == SOURCE_SYSTEM
	&& {Code Type Country} == CODE_TYPE_ID
	&& pebisolan == SOURCE_CODE_KEY,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'none')~> LookupCountry
LookupCountry select(mapColumn(
		pebpebid,
		pebpeaid,
		pebpeoopeaid,
		pebratcod,
		pebratedate,
		pebisolan,
		pebratcomp,
		pebtaxno,
		Pebpever,
		pebdunco,
		MAXPEBPEVER,
		QTBFIELDN,
		QTBVALUE,
		QTBMDESCR,
		QTBSDESCR,
		QTBDISPYNSW,
		peapeaid,
		peamdescr,
		peaccode,
		pealeicode,
		peasubtype,
		peaextid2,
		crcratcod,
		crcmdescr,
		paapeaid,
		paafunct,
		paalongname,
		paacaddress1,
		paacaddress4,
		paacaddress2,
		paacname,
		paacaddress3,
		paactelex,
		pezpezid,
		Key,
		{Partner Name},
		Address,
		{Rating Code},
		{Rating Code desc},
		{Partner Short Name},
		Pezdefbusnbranch,
		{Source System},
		{Code Type State},
		{Code Type Capital},
		{Code Type Comp Sub},
		{Code Type Country},
		{State Code},
		{State Description},
		{Capital Code},
		{Capital Description},
		{Domicile Code} = TARGET_CODE,
		{Domicile Description} = TARGET_DESCRIPTION,
		{Company Sub Code},
		{Company Sub Description}
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select4
Select4, pectable lookup(peapeaid == PECPECID,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'none')~> lookupContractType
lookupContractType select(mapColumn(
		pebpebid,
		pebpeaid,
		pebpeoopeaid,
		pebratcod,
		pebratedate,
		pebisolan,
		pebratcomp,
		pebtaxno,
		Pebpever,
		pebdunco,
		MAXPEBPEVER,
		QTBFIELDN,
		QTBVALUE,
		QTBMDESCR,
		QTBSDESCR,
		QTBDISPYNSW,
		peapeaid,
		peamdescr,
		peaccode,
		pealeicode,
		peasubtype,
		peaextid2,
		crcratcod,
		crcmdescr,
		paapeaid,
		paafunct,
		paalongname,
		paacaddress1,
		paacaddress4,
		paacaddress2,
		paacname,
		paacaddress3,
		paactelex,
		pezpezid,
		Key,
		{Partner Name},
		Address,
		{Rating Code},
		{Rating Code desc},
		{Partner Short Name},
		Pezdefbusnbranch,
		{Source System},
		{Code Type State},
		{Code Type Capital},
		{Code Type Comp Sub},
		{Code Type Country},
		{State Code},
		{State Description},
		{Capital Code},
		{Capital Description},
		{Domicile Code},
		{Domicile Description},
		peccontype = PECCONTYP,
		{Company Sub Code},
		{Company Sub Description}
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select5
Select5 derive({Contract Type} = case(peccontype == '0' , 'NORMAL',case(peccontype == '1','WAR',case(peccontype == '9','XL','OTHER')))) ~> DerivedColumn1
DerivedColumn1, paatable lookup(pebratcomp == paatable@PAAPEAID,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'none')~> Lookup2
Lookup2 select(mapColumn(
		pebdunco,
		QTBMDESCR,
		peaccode,
		pealeicode,
		peaextid2,
		paacaddress1 = Select5@paacaddress1,
		paacaddress4 = Select5@paacaddress4,
		paacaddress2 = Select5@paacaddress2,
		paacaddress3 = Select5@paacaddress3,
		Key,
		{Partner Name},
		Address,
		{Rating Code},
		{Rating Code desc},
		{Partner Short Name},
		{Company Sub Code},
		{Company Sub Description},
		{Capital Code},
		{Capital Description},
		{Domicile Code},
		{Domicile Description},
		{Contract Type},
		{Paacname RatingComp} = paatable@PAACNAME,
		{State } = {State Description},
		pebratedate
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select6
cbsttable derive() ~> DerivedColumn3
